queries.query: SELECT LEFT(mf.physical_name, 2) as disk, SUM(fs.num_of_reads) as num_of_reads, SUM(fs.num_of_bytes_read) as num_of_bytes_read, SUM(fs.num_of_writes) as num_of_writes, SUM(fs.num_of_bytes_written) as num_of_bytes_written, SUM(fs.io_stall) as io_stall, SUM(fs.io_stall_read_ms) as io_stall_read_ms, SUM(fs.io_stall_write_ms) as io_stall_write_ms FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null,null) AS fs INNER JOIN sys.master_files AS mf ON fs.database_id = mf.database_id AND fs.[file_id] = mf.[file_id] GROUP BY LEFT(mf.physical_name, 2) ORDER BY disk;
